message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident it will be a great investment for you. Let me know your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I appreciate your interest.  $11,500 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested in this compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $12,500. Can you consider this price?
